message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value and potential, I'm asking for $950,000.  I think it's a fair price considering the benefits it will bring to your business.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850,000. I believe this price is more in line with the value I can get from the product.
Bob, I understand your perspective on the price, but I believe my initial offer is closer to its true value. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $900,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $875,000. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure the price is right for my business.
Bob, I'm sensing we're getting close.  I value your business and I'm willing to come down slightly further. How about $885,000?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $880,000, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that. I think that's a fair price considering the value I'll get from the product.
